body.name: Lightning X MB50 Breathing & Trauma Stocked Gear Bag w/Fill Kit for First Responder EMT - Red

byLineInfo.name: Visit the Lightning X Products Store

features: [EVERYTHING YOU NEED TO GET STARTED]: You'll be ready to respond to emergency situations with plenty of supplies for CPR, airway, bruises, bumps, sprains, trauma, bleeding, bandaging, wrecks, broken bones, cuts, scrapes, wound cleansing, burns, cardiac & blood pressure diagnostics, kids boo-boo's, bar fights & even that 5-car pile up that's making you late to work

[MORE THAN JUST BANDAGES]: Have you ever purchased a first aid kit with 589,234 pieces and felt like you got ripped off? Our kit includes over 250 items that you'll actually use. We don't "pad the numbers" with tons of bandaids to make it seem like you're getting more in your kit. Our staff includes former EMT's who (between sweeping the floors and taking out the trash) help design our kits with real-world supplies such as a Tourniquet, Chest Seal, Roll Splint, Extrication Collar, Airways & More

[MAKE ANYWHERE YOU GO YOUR HOSPITAL]: The MB50 gear bag is designed to be mobile! With a reinforced carry handle and an adjustable, padded shoulder strap this gear bag and fill kit can go anywhere you go. Perfect for schools, sports, special events, camping, hiking, offices, warehouses, concerts, ball games, day cares, fire departments, rescue squads, POV's, helicopters, space ships, your ex's house... scratch that, you should probably stay away from there

[WE'VE GOT YOUR BACK]: Lightning X has nearly 25 years of experience designing gear bags for first responders. We take feedback very seriously, and work to make our bag designs better and stronger (because if anyone can break something, first responders can). We stand behind our products, and that's why all of our gear bags are backed by a limited lifetime warranty. No, you can't throw your trauma bag out of an airplane, but if it breaks for any reason due to how we made it, we'll replace it
[DIMS + COLORS]: The MB50 EMT Trauma Bag is available in Red, Blue and Fluorescent Orange color choices. The bag measures 28" (L) x 13" (W) x 12" (H) when closed

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #252,395 in Health & Household (See Top 100 in Health & Household) #901 in First Aid Kits (Health & Household)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: MB50 Trauma Bag w/ Fill Kit D The MB50 is designed to stand up to the most challenging EMS situations Built with 8 zippered compartments, a multitude of elastic loop storage, and 360 degrees of elastic mesh pockets on the interior – the MB50 has ample storage room and makes for easy organization for all your supplies.

Build to be Tough, Visible, and Mobile Features Include: Full stock contents listed below in descriptionRemovable padded oxygen cylinder pad with elastic security loop360 degree reflective striping for safety and visibility on scenePVC/nylon reinforced bottom to prevent abrasion and keep supplies dryEmbroidered reflective medical Star of Life Logo on main flap

Included Supplies Comes with everything you need to get started All in all, the MB50 is designed to adapt to a variety of EMS applications and is sure to provide you with years of use! The D kit comes with all of the supplies shown above.

Available in these colors Description The MB50 is an extra-large medical bag that is ideal for EMS agencies or rescue squads. The main compartment is designed to hold a “D” sized cylinder with storage for all necessary airway delivery devices. The front, rear and top compartments stretch the full length of the bag and are great for cervical collars, splints or even intubation equipment. The two end compartments together will hold as much as a small EMT bag. With all the included loops, pouches, pockets and compartments the MB50 is the bag of choice for any trauma situation. Dimensions: 28″(L) x13″(W) x 12″(H)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice quality bag and contents
reviews.reviewText: Huge selection of contents. Bag zippers are heavy duty, bag material should last taking lots of abuse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 22, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Trouble getting oxygen tank filled
reviews.reviewText: Nice bag, my only trouble is no one in my city will fill the oxygen tank. I have a prescription for oxygen and a service that provides bottles to my home. But no one will fill my personal tank???

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfecto y llegó completo

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2021
reviews.reviewText: My order arrived with everything and is a great deal!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars love my Awesome Trauma Bag
reviews.reviewText: This bag is really stocked with wonderful things.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Items inside are close to expiration date
reviews.reviewText: Found items that will expire as soon as 1 year. Not a reliable bag since you will be paying more money to replace expired items. Not able to return, Seller Lightning X Products, Inc uncooperative.
